text: Mary Overlie (January 15, 1946 - June 5, 2020) was an American choreographer, dancer, theater artist, professor and author. She was a creator of the Six Viewpoints technique for theater and dance. She was born in Havre, Montana. Overlie was the co-founder of the art institutions such as Danspace Project, the Studies Project, Movement Research, and the Experimental Theater Wing at New York University. Overlie died on June 5, 2020 at the age of 74. ==References== Category:American dancers Category:New York University faculty Category:American choreographers Category:Writers from Montana Category:1946 births Category:2020 deaths Category:People from Havre, Montana
title: Mary Overlie
